comments: The spelling 'Ciocîrlan' in Brummitt & Powell, Authors of Plant Names (1992) is an error copied from the Meikle list.
examples: Agrostis stolonifera var. magnoligulata Ciocârlan in Jordanov et al., Problems  Balkan Fl. & Veg.: 246 (1975)
source: Letter from A. Hansen 17 Apr. 1980. Lifespan from Contributii Botanicae 49: 259-260. 2014.
